# statmisc

- [statmisc](#statmisc)
  - [Installation](#installation)

A collection of convenient utility functions for statistical data
analaysis and data-cleaning.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `statmisc` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("StatGenCore/statmisc")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`dc_01_to_noyes()`](https://statgencore.github.io/statmisc/reference/dc_01_to_noyes.md)
  : Convert 0/1 vector to "No"/"Yes" factor
